multiple_choice.question: With whom did the lazy jackal live?
Whom did the jackal take to meet his father?
Where did the jackal crawl to get rid of the sun?

fill_in_the_blanks.question: Jackal jumped up and took the goats out to graze
Jackal put the sun on his back and started the journey home
The different colours always reminded Jackal not to be so foolish again

meanings.different: not the same as another or each other
meanings.shining: giving out or reflecting bright light
meanings.complain: express dissatisfaction or annoyance about something
meanings.crawl: move forward on the hands and knees
